Html: I see no release since June last year and there are questions in the forum without any answer.
Even though I cannot answer to your question - I'm just another user of this excellent library - all I can say is that the library is solid enough, and it just works (for us, at least).

Thank you fernandonajera. I too found this library to be solid. I even wrote a review for it and gave it 5 stars. But without an active maintainer, I would hesitate to put it into production environment.
